summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Phase 4 Module D Task D3: Onboarding Progress Tracker with ARRIS-synced step tracking. All 25 backend API tests passed. Frontend testing confirmed all UI components render correctly including progress bar, step status cards, ARRIS encouragement messages, post-onboarding checklist with checkboxes, activity timeline, and rewards section.
passed_tests: GET /api/onboarding/progress - Requires authentication (401/403)
GET /api/onboarding/progress - Returns detailed progress data with all expected fields
GET /api/onboarding/progress - Percentage calculated correctly (completed_steps/total_steps * 100)
GET /api/onboarding/progress/timeline - Requires authentication
GET /api/onboarding/progress/timeline - Returns timeline events array with total_events count
GET /api/onboarding/progress/timeline - Events sorted by timestamp descending
GET /api/onboarding/progress/arris-insight - Requires authentication
GET /api/onboarding/progress/arris-insight - Returns personalized insight and recommendation
GET /api/onboarding/checklist - Requires authentication
GET /api/onboarding/checklist - Requires completed onboarding (returns 400 if incomplete)
GET /api/onboarding/checklist - Returns checklist with 6 items totaling 150 points
PATCH /api/onboarding/checklist/{item_id} - Requires authentication
PATCH /api/onboarding/checklist/{item_id} - Updates item completion status and returns points_change
PATCH /api/onboarding/checklist/INVALID - Returns 400 for invalid item ID
GET /api/admin/onboarding/progress/{creator_id} - Requires authentication
GET /api/admin/onboarding/progress/{creator_id} - Admin can view any creator's progress
GET /api/admin/onboarding/progress/INVALID - Returns 404 for invalid creator
GET /api/admin/onboarding/progress/{creator_id}/timeline - Requires authentication
GET /api/admin/onboarding/progress/{creator_id}/timeline - Returns creator timeline with events
ARRIS message types verified (celebration for complete, reminder for skipped, etc.)
Time metrics structure verified (started_at, last_activity, estimated_remaining/total_duration)
Rewards structure verified (type, name, points, earned_at)
Progress includes post_onboarding_checklist when onboarding is complete
Checklist points calculated correctly (earned_points matches sum of completed items)
Checklist progress percentage correct (completed_count/total_count * 100)
Frontend: Progress tab shows in CreatorDashboard
Frontend: OnboardingProgressTracker component renders correctly
Frontend: Progress bar shows 100% for completed onboarding
Frontend: ARRIS celebration message displayed for completed onboarding
Frontend: All 7 steps shown with green checkmarks
Frontend: Time metrics displayed (Started X ago, Completed in Y)
Frontend: Rewards Earned section shows 'Hive Newcomer' badge (+100 pts)
Frontend: Setup Checklist shows 6 items with correct point values
Frontend: Checklist items can be checked/unchecked
Frontend: Checklist toggle persists after page refresh
Frontend: Points update correctly when items are toggled
Frontend: Activity Timeline shows completed steps with dates
Frontend: Resume onboarding button hidden for completed onboarding
critical_code_review_comments: onboarding_wizard_service.py - Well-structured progress tracker with comprehensive data including steps, time metrics, ARRIS messages, and checklist
Progress percentage calculation is correct: int((completed_steps / total_steps) * 100)
ARRIS encouragement messages properly vary based on progress state (welcome, early, midway, almost, final, celebration, reminder)
Post-onboarding checklist correctly initialized with 6 items totaling 150 points
Checklist items: first_proposal (50pts), connect_socials (30pts), explore_arris (25pts), explore_dashboard (15pts), set_notification_prefs (20pts), upgrade_tier (10pts)
'Setup Champion' badge (100pts) awarded when all checklist items completed
Timeline events properly sorted by timestamp descending
OnboardingProgressTracker.js - Clean component with proper state management and API integration
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
seed_data_creation: Pro creator (protest@hivehq.com) has completed onboarding with all 7 steps. One checklist item 'explore_dashboard' was marked complete during testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 4 Module D Task D3 (Onboarding Progress Tracker) fully tested and working. The progress tracker provides: 1) Detailed progress with step status, time metrics, estimated remaining time; 2) ARRIS encouragement messages based on progress percentage (welcome 0%, early <30%, midway <60%, almost <90%, final <100%, celebration 100%); 3) Activity timeline showing onboarding events; 4) Post-onboarding checklist with 6 items worth 150 total points; 5) 'Setup Champion' badge (100pts) awarded for completing all checklist items. Collections used: creator_onboarding (extended), creator_checklist (new). The Pro creator has completed onboarding and can access the checklist. Frontend component OnboardingProgressTracker.js properly renders all sections.

progress_tracker_features: Overall progress percentage and step status
Time metrics (started, last activity, estimated remaining, total duration)
ARRIS encouragement messages based on progress
Rewards tracking with badges and points
